title: VS Otokonoko♥
sinopse:
Kobashi, Ayaka, 17 years old, an age to yearn for love. Because of her father's hypnotism, when a boy touches her, she becomes violent. "If this keeps up, I can never love anyone--" But then, a new cool/popular transfer student Iijima Shima confesses to Tsubaki and...?!

(Source: Chibi Manga)

Included one-shots: Therapy Time; Limit
